elem.title: Rankless, a quick and pretty interactive visualization platform, built on massive data
contributions to papers where the data was too large, complex or difficult to collect and process
ML models and integer optimization software to optimize logistics of perishable goods, and assess the performance of soccer teams and players
curricula for courses that I ended up teaching, about programming, data engineering and applied machine learning
a bunch of small, open-source stuff to make my life and/or work easier
neovim, linux with leftwm and a split-keyboard to show off
AI mostly from the command line and rather selectively, but appreciatively
